entry.title: Week in Ethereum News December 31, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Shapella (Shanghai + Capella) upgrade Cancun + D-starname upgrade Layer 1 Research Client releases Layer 2 EIPs/Standards This newsletter is made possible thanks to Hardhat’s VSCode extension!
